item.title: God Shall Wipe Away All Tears
item.description:
God Shall Wipe Away All Tears by Elder Evan A. Schmutz, Of the Seventy given in Session 6 of 186th Semiannual General Conference on Fri Sep 30 2016
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.

item.title: Trusting the Doctrine of Christ
item.description:
Trusting the Doctrine of Christ by Elder Evan A. Schmutz, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 193rd Annual General Conference on Fri Mar 31 2023
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
